Pre-Game Insights: South Africa go into their clash against Bangladesh knowing a win will all but seal their spot in the Super Eight stage of the T20 World Cup.
The South Africa captain, Aiden Markram, warned of the threat Bangladesh pose, especially with their all-round bowling attack.

Bangladesh's coach, Chandika Hathurusinghe, said his team was ‘relieved’ to have got over the line against Sri Lanka in their first match, but he expects them to perform better in their remaining three group games.
